remarks: The restriction of a complete metric space is complete iff it is closed.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cmsss.h $e |- K = ( M |`s A ) $.
cmsss.x $e |- X = ( Base ` M ) $.
cmsss.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` M ) $.
cmsss $p |- ( ( M e. CMetSp /\ A C_ X ) -> ( K e. CMetSp <-> A e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) $.
